entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING ENDED, Nain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 AM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -13.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nain Airport 10:18 AM AST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -13.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -17.2°C
Wind: NW 56 km/h gust 68 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Friday 27 January 2023
